metadata.dc:author: Cirami, M
Nari, G
metadata.dc:description: The Authors presents 3 cases of Hepatic Pseudotumours, analyzed of the diagnostics procedures, concluding that a correct interpretation of the Sonography and CT avoid the utilization of invasive methods.
metadata.dc:title: Pseudotumores de Hígado: un problema diagnóstico.
[Liver pseudotumor: a diagnostic problem].
